_comment: CSP Note: 'unsafe-eval' is required for Google Ads (pagead2.googlesyndication.com) which uses eval() for ad rendering. Cloudflare Turnstile also requires it for CAPTCHA challenges. This is a known limitation of these third-party services.

globalHeaders.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://challenges.cloudflare.com https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https: blob:; font-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self' https://*.azurestaticapps.net https://*.azurecontainerapps.io https://challenges.cloudflare.com; frame-src https://challenges.cloudflare.com https://googleads.g.doubleclick.net; frame-ancestors 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self'
